channel.title: Invisible players
channel.description: Hello everyone. I have just recently made a webclient for my pi server. The source was erased-pkz. I have about 10 on and we are getting this glitch where we can't see each other. We can see the dot on the minimap and when you walk over them you can right click them, but you cant see the character. I have been messing around with it and it seems like it has something to do with the custom models. Any suggestions? Thanks in advance.
